summary: This event is an opportunity for individuals to join the creative team at ACE UTSG and experience various roles within the organization. Applications are due on October 11th at 11:59 PM.
title: Join Our Creative Team at ACE UTSG

summary: Technical Interview Night provides students with the chance to network with industry professionals and practice their interview skills through mock interviews with real recruiters.
title: Technical Interview Night

summary: The WiCS 2024-25 high school mentorship program is seeking mentors to guide female high school students interested in tech. Applications are open until October 7th at 11:59 PM.
title: WiCS High School Mentorship Program Applications Open

summary: This event is a call for nominations to recognize outstanding pharmacy students for their contributions and achievements during the month of September. Participants can nominate their peers through a link provided in the bio, with a deadline for submissions set for October 4th, 2024.
title: Nominate Your Outstanding Pharmacy Peers!

summary: The UTCC community is invited to enjoy new climbing sessions added to the schedule. The sessions will take place on Wednesdays, Thursdays, Fridays, and Sundays at Basecamp QW and Basecamp BW.
title: New Climbing Sessions for UTCC Community

summary: The WISE National Conference 2025, themed 'Reaching for the Stars', will focus on inspiring ambition and innovation in STEM through workshops, competitions, and discussions with industry leaders.
title: WISE National Conference 2025: Reaching for the Stars
